basics.name: Sergei Ievlev
basics.label: Quality Assurance Engineer
basics.summary: I have over a decade of experience as a Quality Assurance Engineer, specializing in embedded systems testing. My focus is on enhancing the quality of the final product to create the best user experience by developing processes with the team and using proven technologies. I work closely with developers, analysts, and product owners to initiate testing as early as possible, reducing the cost of bugs and minimizing their occurrence. I prioritize solving problems through clear communication and am always willing to assist the testing team with their routine and questions related to principles and methodologies. I believe it is crucial to make the testing process results visible to the team. In addition to strong hard skills, I excel at communicating and finding approaches to team members to make our collaboration as comfortable and effective as possible. Currently, I am based in Berlin and interested in advancing my career as a Senior QA Engineer or Head of QA.

education.institution: National Research Nuclear University MEPhI (Moscow Engineering Physics Institute)

work.summary: Medlinx develops a document automation system for medical institutions, that combines a medical decision support system, electronic medical records of patients and medical research data in digital form.
highlights: Designed 50+ manual and automated UI tests, increasing coverage by 15%
Developed 15+ API autotests, cutting API defects by 10%
Maintained up-to-date test scenarios in the Qase TMS and optimized repository

work.summary: Labomatix develops software for medical and laboratory devices that reduce biometric errors and accelerate biometric diagnostics.
highlights: Enhanced test processes, reducing production bugs from 15 per release to 1-2 minor issues
Conducted exploratory API testing, eliminating persistent errors
Developed 50+ API autotests, increasing API coverage by 40%

work.summary: Woodenshark is a product design and development agency that specializes in creating innovative devices from concept to production.
highlights: Built and refined comprehensive testing processes from scratch, encompassing requirements testing to detailed test and bug reports for managers and developers
Increased test coverage from 2% to 60%, ensuring comprehensive testing of all critical functions
Performed hypothesis testing for 5 new projects

work.summary: Performed manual test routines from test design to execution, developing documentation and instructions.
